title: All Ball - UCLA Asst. Michael Lewis on Final Four Run, Gonzaga Matchup -- Gregg Gottlieb Talks Pac-12 Tourney Resurgence
itunes:title: All Ball - UCLA Asst. Michael Lewis on Final Four Run, Gonzaga Matchup -- Gregg Gottlieb Talks Pac-12 Tourney Resurgence
description:
In this episode, Doug talks with UCLA Assistant Coach Michael Lewis about the Bruins' sneaking into the NCAA Tourney, what came together during their unexpected Final Four run and their upcoming matchup with undefeated Gonzaga. Also longtime Pac-12 Assistant Gregg Gottlieb explains what's behind the much maligned Pac-12's tournament resurgence. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
